document.masterDocTitle: The Smicridea (Smicridea) fasciatella species group (Trichoptera: Hydropsychidae) in Brazil: six new species and new distributional records

figureCitation.captionText: Fig. 16. Geographical distribution maps. A. Distribution of Smicridea (Smicridea) erecta Flint,1974. B. Distribution of Smicridea (Smicridea) obliqua Flint,1974.
